General.Name: Fujian Qingshan Paper Industry Co Ltd
General.Description: Fujian Qingshan Paper Industry Co.,Ltd. engages in the production and sale of pulp and paper products in China. The company offers paper bag papers, Kraft cardboard, corrugated papers, and color paste board, as well as viscose fiber wood pulp under the Tsingshan and Qinshan brands. Its paper products are used in for the packaging of cement, chemicals, fertilizers, food, feed, building materials, etc.; bamboo pulp products used to produce pulp film plastic products, household paper, special paper, cultural paper, and other raw materials; and dissolving pulp products for textile industry. The company was formerly known as Qingzhou Paper Mill. Fujian Qingshan Paper Industry Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1958 and is based in Sanming, China.
